about_the_game:
WARPSQUAD is a space exploration rogue-lite in an ever-changing galaxy to be played solo or co-op. Encounter a wide range of hostile spaceships, special events, and upgrades to your ship and crew. Master the ship terminals and crew with unique traits to survive this hostile world.

Take control of a spaceship crew and explore the universe, upgrading your ship and crew in preparation for the final battle.

Features
  • Take control of a spaceship and crew, alone or with a friend.
  • Navigate an ever-changing path to victory full of danger and opportunity.
  • Upgrade your ship and crew with a unique and large set of Ship Augments & Crew Mutations.
  • Optimize your strategy against a wide range of combat encounters.
  • Make important decisions through text-based Events and in-world Scenarios that have a deep-influence on your playthrough.
  • Real-time with Pause lets you take a break from the chaos to re-plan your strategy in combat.
  • Death is permanent, and each playthrough is unique with procedural encounters and events.

Take control of a spaceship crew and explore the universe, upgrading your ship and crew in preparation for the final battle.

name: WARPSQUAD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: WARPSQUAD is a space exploration rogue-lite in an ever-changing galaxy to be played solo or co-op. Encounter a wide range of hostile spaceships, special events, and upgrades to your ship and crew. Master the ship terminals and crew with unique traits to survive this hostile world.
